lead_paragraph: TROUTMAN--Patricia W. January 11, 2016. Wife of the late Courtland W. Troutman. Wake at Pelham Funeral Home, 64 Lincoln Ave, Pelham, NY, Friday, 2-4 and 7-9pm. Funeral Mass, Saturday, 10am, St. Catharine's, 25 Second Ave, Pelham, NY. 1/3
